mapper.select: SELECT bck.id, b.`name` AS brandname, s.`name` AS shopname, s.id AS shopid, s.phone, s.email, up.address, bc.brand_logo, '' AS domain, CASE WHEN s.business_id = 1 THEN '家电' WHEN s.business_id = 2 THEN '家具' WHEN s.business_id = 3 THEN '家装' WHEN s.business_id = 4 THEN '家饰' WHEN s.business_id = 5 THEN '净水' END AS business, bck.create_time, CASE WHEN bck.`status` = 0 THEN '已认领' WHEN bck.`status` = 1 THEN '已认领，等待店铺通过' END AS `status` FROM brands b INNER JOIN brand_club bc ON b.id = bc.brand_outer_id INNER JOIN brands_club_key bck ON bc.brand_id = bck.brandClub_id INNER JOIN shops s ON bck.shop_id = s.id LEFT JOIN user_profiles up ON s.user_id = up.user_id where bc.brand_id=#{id}

SELECT bck.id, b.`name` AS brandname, s.`name` AS shopname, s.id AS shopid, s.phone, s.email, up.address, bc.brand_logo, '' AS domain, CASE WHEN s.business_id = 1 THEN '家电' WHEN s.business_id = 2 THEN '家具' WHEN s.business_id = 3 THEN '家装' WHEN s.business_id = 4 THEN '家饰' WHEN s.business_id = 5 THEN '净水' END AS business, bck.create_time, CASE WHEN bck.`status` = 0 THEN '已认领' WHEN bck.`status` = 1 THEN '已认领，等待店铺通过' END AS `status` FROM brands b INNER JOIN brand_club bc ON b.id = bc.brand_outer_id INNER JOIN brands_club_key bck ON bc.brand_id = bck.brandClub_id INNER JOIN shops s ON bck.shop_id = s.id LEFT JOIN user_profiles up ON s.user_id = up.user_id where bc.brand_id=#{id} and s.`name` like CONCAT('%',#{shopname},'%')
